name: RCS Adrift
description:
You are the commander of a spaceship. You engage the main engine. It cannot be stopped. You must perform a series of course corrections using nothing but 16 RCS control thrusters spread out over four quads.

There is only one try. There is no extra fuel. There is no help...

...Well, a manual from Apollo program may come in handy if you need help with the RCS: https://history.nasa.gov/afj/aoh/aoh-v1-2-05-rcs.pdf

Made for the GMTK Jam 2019.
